import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import './ad-files.css' const ADFiles = (props) => { const [files, setFiles] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3001/getFiles') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setFiles(data)) .catch(error => console.error(error)); }, []); return (
AD-Files - Superb Arctic Turtle

Client files:

{files.map((file, index) => (

  • File ID: {file.file_id}

    Client ID: {file.client_id}

    File Progress: {file.file_progress}

    • ))}
    Appointments Clients Updates Files Transactions
    Logout
    ) } export default ADFiles
